title: Ep54: General Hunter-Weston
itunes:title: Ep54: General Hunter-Weston
itunes:subtitle: Peter and Gary tell the story of Lieutenant-General Sir Aylmer Hunter-Weston, the controversial figure who commanded the British 29th Division at Gallipoli. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For...
description:
Peter and Gary tell the story of Lieutenant-General Sir Aylmer Hunter-Weston, the controversial figure who commanded the British 29th Division at Gallipoli.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
